page.title: 02TRANSPORT TRAFFIC NORTHOP
page.content: A useful exercise in any village is to determine the weight of traffic. At the present time Clwyd is busy constructing new roads and Northop is being considered for a new bye-pass. We thought that it would be interesting to carry out a survey of traffic to see just how busy Northop is.On July 8th six pupils from Argoed High School carried out two traffic counts of thirty minutes. Each pupil was given one road to cover and the following were counted:- cars, large vehicles, bicycles and pedestrians. Here are the results:- Count 1 Count 2 TOTAL Mark 90 80 170 Stuart 241 277 518 Robert 126 87 213 Alun 197 217 414 Andrew 258 266 524 Sean 210 225 435
